'''16w03a''' is the fiftieth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on January 20, 2016.<ref name="blogpost_16w03a">https://www.mojang.com/2016/01/minecraft-snapshot-16w03a/</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Beacon]]s'''
* No longer immediately activate when placed on valid pyramids, as they had in the previous snapshot.

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[Minecart]]s'''
* All types of minecarts now display their <code>CustomName</code> when <code>CustomNameVisible</code> is set.

=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|achievement}}'''
* No longer affects [[statistics]].

=== General ===
'''[[Sound]]s'''
* More new sounds.{{info needed}}
* Some updated sounds.{{info needed}}

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=16w03a|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|54546|When a piston retracts, the piston will sometimes becomes transparent for a split second.
|68383|Certain entities are not properly showing <code>CustomName</code> when <code>CustomNameVisible</code> is set to true.
|71006|Minecart with hopper and minecart with chest's GUIs' name is "Minecart".
|75822|Enderman will not attack upon being stared at above or below 5 blocks of them.
|80826|{{cmd|achievement}} command works unreliably with statistics.
|;dev
|88353|Fishing Rod cannot cast from boat.
|89344|Textures become invisible when breaking/placing blocks.
|91698|Flying boat crash.
|92266|Dead mobs are not removed from their teams.
|;previous
|95539|All damage types cause knockback.
|95541|Null pointer exception: <code>Failed to load data for block entity Beacon</code>.
|95547|Building an end portal doesn't work.
|95612|Variant biomes/M-types/sunflower plains are no longer being generated.
|95660|Chicken dying in one tick from fire damage.
}}</onlyinclude>

'''Other bug fixes'''
* "Some serious issues that were not reported on our bugtracker, so they don't have a MC-number or ticket."<ref name="blogpost_16w03a" />
